node.doctext:
The group


The [e2lefties] usergroup has been set up as a group for noders actively interested in [left-wing] political thought, discussion and activities.

FAQ

Q: Do I have to do anything?
A: Well, the [idea] at the moment is to make use of [Political Asylum] to stage debates with those in [FreedomForum] who want to participate (or anyone else who's up for a good argument). Although we realise that we are unlikely to resolve any issues (the [greatest political minds of the twentieth century] couldn't conclusively achieve this), we hope that on each issue discussed, two convincing sides will be developed. These can then be [written up] by a representative of each group and posted on a collaborative node.

Q: What if I don't want to debate?
A: You can still contribute to the group by raising issues, or [notify]ing us of events (protests perhaps?) or just [sit and watch]. We’re still new, so once we work out exactly what we’re doing, there’ll be something more useful here. You can also contribute to the group's shared document, "[What's Left?]"

Q: Do I have to address other group members as "[comrade]" or "comrade editor/god"?
A: No, not unless you really feel the need to.
